arts.ttl: Dortmund demolish Wolfsburg as Serhou Guirassy and Karim Adeyemi aid top-four charge
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund took a big win over Wolfsburg that boosts their hopes of UEFA Champions League qualification, with Serhou Guirassy and Karim Adeyemi both bagging braces. In just the third minute, Guirassy latched onto a scuffed pass from Julian Brandt, composed himself on the edge of the box, and slotted past Kamil Grabara to give Dortmund an early lead.

arts.ttl: Kovač willing Dortmund to "unleash a force" on visiting Wolfsburg
arts.sum: Here's what Niko Kovač had to say in his press conference this afternoon.
